original_title: Galle District final results released; NPP wins 7 seats
original_body_lines: The Election Commission of Sri Lanka has released the final results of the Galle District in the 2024 General Election with the National People’s Power (NPP) polling more than 68% of the total votes in the district.
NPP has polled 406,428 votes to win the district while the Samagi Jana Balawegaya (SJB) is second with 93,486 votes (15.66%).
Accordingly, the NPP has secured 07 seats in the district while the SJB and the SLPP have won a seat each in the district.
